ccre.cluck

Class CluckPublisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.cluck.CluckPublisher

  • public class CluckPublisher
extends java.lang.Object
    A file that handles publishing and subscribing of basic channels.
    Author:
    skeggsc

    • Method Detail

      • setupSearching

        public static EventOutput setupSearching(CluckNode node,
                         CluckRemoteListener listener)
        Start a search process on the specified network. This will tell the listener each time a new remote is discovered, and the EventOutput returned from this method will cause the network to be rechecked for new elements. Note that unlike the previous implementation, this implementation will not send a checking message until the EventOutput is fired.
        Parameters:
        node - the network to search.
        listener - the listener to tell about new nodes.
        Returns:
        the EventOutput that rechecks the network.

      • subscribeLT

        public static LoggingTarget subscribeLT(CluckNode node,
                        java.lang.String path,
                        LogLevel minimum)
        Subscribe to a LoggingTarget from the network at the specified path, with only sending data for at least a minimum logging level.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to publish on.
        path - The path to subscribe to.
        minimum - The minimum logging level to send over the network.
        Returns:
        the LoggingTarget.

      • publish

        public static void publish(CluckNode node,
           java.lang.String name,
           BooleanInput input)
        Publish a BooleanInput on the network. This will send values to clients when they connect.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to publish on.
        name - The name for the BooleanInput.
        input - The BooleanInput.

      • subscribeBI

        public static BooleanInput subscribeBI(CluckNode node,
                       java.lang.String path,
                       boolean subscribeByDefault)
        Subscribe to a BooleanInput from the network at the specified path.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to publish on.
        path - The path to subscribe to.
        subscribeByDefault - Should this request the value from the remote by default, as opposed to waiting until this is needed. If this is false, then readValue() won't work until you run addTarget().
        Returns:
        the BooleanInput.

      • publish
